summary: Nina, an end-of-teenage orphan with mental problems, starts a new job as a garden cleaner when she meets Toni. They fell in love with each other, but soon Toni starts betraying Nina. In the... See full summary »
cast: Julia Hummer|Sabine Timoteo|Marianne Basler|Aurélien Recoing|Benno Fürmann|Anna Schudt|Claudia Geisler-Bading|Philipp Hauß|Victoria Trauttmansdorff|Peter Kurth|Annika Blendl|Rosa Enskat
title: Gespenster
